en.title: Your divorce

progressBar.getDecreeNisi: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} applies for a decree nisi

progressedNoAos.heading: Contact the divorce centre
progressedNoAos.info: You can no longer respond to this application online. Contact the divorce centre to find out what to do next.

progressedUndefended.heading: You have submitted your response
progressedUndefended.info: Your response will be checked and you'll be contacted about what you need to do next.

awaitingAnswer.heading: You need to submit your answer
awaitingAnswer.para1: You must now submit the 'answer to a divorce application' form. The deadline for the court to receive this is 21 days from the date you first signed in to respond to the application.
awaitingAnswer.para2: Download and fill in the paper form.
awaitingAnswer.para4: You'll have to pay a £245 fee when you submit the form.
awaitingAnswer.para5: You'll probably have to go to a hearing with your {{ session.divorceWho }} to try to come to an agreement over the divorce.
awaitingAnswer.para6: If you don't submit your answer before the deadline, then your {{ session.divorceWho }} can continue the divorce as if you hadn't said that you intended to defence the divorce.

defendedDivorce.heading: You have submitted your response
defendedDivorce.info: Your response will be checked and you'll be contacted about what you need to do next.

other.heading: Please contact Courts and Tribunals Service Centre for more information

en.helpContent: You can contact the divorce centre if you need help. Court staff can’t give you legal advice however, and you should speak to a solicitor or legal adviser.
en.improveContent: Please help us improve this service by leaving your feedback.

contactDetails.heading: Getting help
contactDetails.decreeNisiLink: Decree nisi
contactDetails.decreeAbsoluteLink: Decree absolute
